summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period ending July 31, 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting significant outgoing transfers to other financial institutions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Statement Summary
events.description: Summary of account balances and transactions for the month of July 2015.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Silicon Valley Bank
events.description: A transfer of $600,000.00 was made to Silicon Valley Bank.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Morgan Stanley
events.description: A transfer of $1,000,000.00 was made to Morgan Stanley.

locations: Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, 345 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $71,753,496.27 as of July 1, 2015.
The account experienced an outgoing transfer of $600,000.00 to Silicon Valley Bank on July 24, 2015.
The account experienced an outgoing transfer of $1,000,000.00 to Morgan Stanley on July 28, 2015.
The ending balance of the account as of July 31, 2015, was $71,753,496.27.
Interest payment of $59,307.71 was credited to the account on July 31, 2015.
